name: Slash
description: A basic attack that deals damage to the frontmost enemy.

name: Protect
description: Creates a protective armor layer on self.

name: Heal
description: Restores health to the ally with lowest health.

name: Arcane Blast
description: A powerful magical attack that hits the furthest enemy.

name: Arcane Barrier
description: Creates a regenerating shield on a valuable ally.

name: Divine Protection
description: Grants temporary overhealth to all allies.

name: Quick Shot
description: A swift attack prioritizing wounded enemies.

name: Iron Skin
description: Hardens own skin to create a strong armor layer.

name: Vitality Surge
description: Grants overhealth to the weakest ally.

name: Smash
description: A brutal attack that crushes the nearest foe.

name: Stab
description: Quick strike targeting vulnerable enemies.

name: Hex
description: Curses a middle-positioned enemy with weakness.

name: Cleave
description: Sweeping attack that hits up to 3 front enemies.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Lightning bolt that jumps between enemies.

name: Rally
description: Inspires self and adjacent allies, boosting attack.

name: Assassinate
description: Deadly strike against the weakest enemy.

name: Firestorm
description: Rains fire on all enemies from the back line forward.

name: Boulder Toss
description: Throws a boulder at center enemies with splash damage.

name: Heal Wave
description: Healing energy that flows through wounded allies.

name: Blade Dance
description: Attacks all Blade-type enemies with fury.

name: Guardian Wall
description: All Banner allies gain massive armor.

name: Echo Pulse
description: Damages enemies after the second position.

name: Fracture Reality
description: Random blast that pierces through 2 enemies.

name: Bond Sacrifice
description: Sacrifices self to fully heal all other allies.

name: Intimidate
description: Reduces speed of front 3 enemies.

name: Last Stand
description: Powerful attack when self is below 30% health.

name: Retaliate
description: Counter-attacks when taking damage.
